name: Stout-Folk
description: Stout-Folk are smaller humanoids with sturdy builds and a strong connection to their homeworld of Kragfel, which they have long been forced to live beneath the surface. They are industrious, often excelling in mining, underground farming, and crafting. Stout-Folk communities are known for their hospitality and resilience, never turning away a stranger or outsider.

options.name: Small
options.description: Stout-folk are small creatures, but do not suffer the physique penalty or gain a finesse bonus due to their broad and sturdy nature. You have a -1 penalty to movement speed.

options.name: Stout-Folk Skin
options.description: The Stout-Folk have extremely resilient skin that offers protection from the elements and corrosive effects. Gain +1 toxic, lightning, cold and heat mitigation.

options.name: Reaction : Strong Chin
options.description: In response to failing a check that results in you becoming dazed or stunned, roll a d20. On a 12 or higher, you ignore the condition.

options.name: Sunblind
options.description: Generations underground have left your eyes poorly adapted to bright light. You roll with a penalty die on senses checks that use vision while in daylight or similarly bright conditions.
